full_summary:
==========================

**Stationary Laboratory Thresher and Agricultural Machinery**

*   **Title (English/French):** Stationary Laboratory Thresher / Batteuse de laboratoire à poste fixe
*   **Reference Number (English/French):** WS4552530837 / WS4552530837 (english)/WS45321863274 (french ) (re-generated by me)
*   **Publication Date:** [2024-06-04]
*   **Tender Closing Date:** 2024-06-25T14:00:00
*   **UNSPSC Codes:**
    *   UNSPSC: 21101700
    *   UNSPSC Description (English/French): Agricultural machinery for harvesting / Machines agricoles pour la récolte
*   **Zip / Postal Code:** K1A 0S5
*   **Procurement Category:** GS (Gross schedual)<mark>NB</mark>

**Tender Status:**

*   **English:** Expired
*   **French:** Expiré

The government is looking to procure a Stationary Laboratory Thresher for use by the Department of Agriculture and Agri-Food.

**Notice of Request for Quote (RFQ)**

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)/Ministère des Travaux publics et des Services gouvernementaux (TPSGC) issued a request for Quote for Agricultural machinery and supplies, dated June 4, 2024.

**Important Information**

*   The deadline for quote submission is June 25, 2024, at 14:00.
*   Procurement method is open tender.
*   The contract duration will start on July 1, 2024, and shall end on June 30, 2024.
*   Trade agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)/Accord de libre-échange canadien (ALEC)
*   The stationary laboratory thresher shall be deployed to various region mentioned below and used by different departments/ministères.


    *   Region / région (english and French): Brandon / Brandon
*   Contracting entity name (English/French): Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) / Ministère des Travaux publics et des Services gouvernementaux (TPSGC)
*   Lowest price will be used as the selection criteria.
*   The notice URL is available at https://discovery.ariba.com/r
